name: formik

scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production tsc -p tsconfig.base.json  && rollup -c && rimraf compiled && cp-cli ./index.js ./dist/index.js
scripts.build-website: cd website && yarn install && yarn build
scripts.start: cp-cli ./index.js ./dist/index.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=development rollup -w -c | tsc -w -p tsconfig.base.json
